availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William C. Musselman (Cynthiana, Harrison County, Kentucky, captain)

body.p: Cynthiana, Harrison County, Kentucky, captain. Kentucky native. Son of James Musselman and Ellen Musselman. Mustered in as 1st lieutenant in the 20th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) on January 6, 1861, in Smithland. Promoted to captain on January 1, 1863. Mustered out on January 17, 1865, in Louisville.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison, District No. 2, p. 41.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison, Cynthiana, p. 4.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 44, 50, 949.
Find A Grave, "William C. Musselman (1839-1887)," Memorial #43077335, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/43077335 (accessed January 17, 2019).
